title: John Lyttle
text: John Lyttle (20 January 1931 – 15 November 1997) was an Irish <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201952%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Heavyweight">men's heavyweight</a> event at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a>.
